string.value: #p2111001# seemed to think long and hard about #p2111002#'s research, then said maybe #b#p2111003##k might know something about the medicine. #p2111003#? The one who can't even remember his past? How??
When I asked #p2111003# about #p2111002#, he had no clue who he was. However, he did mention something about this medicine that he held on from the moment he opened his eyes.
Keeny's medicine... I see... I don't know if that afterimage of #p2111002# that you saw is real, but... even if it is, no potion/medicine was found at #p2111002#'s lab. I have no clue, except...
...except maybe #p2111003# knows a thing or two about it. How about visiting him instead?
If the one #p2111003# holds on to is... really that, then... it's not a mechanical doll with no recollection of the past, but...
If you don't want to do it, then there's nothing I can do about it, but... please think again, for the sake of #p2111005#...
Hello, traveler. What can a Humanoid do for you? \r\n#b#L0# Do you know anything about De Lang?#l

...What? #p2111002#...? The name does not ring a bell... but it does sound quite familiar. Maybe I knew of him in the past... but like I said, I do not have any recollection of the past... or maybe I don't even have a past, period...\r\n#b#L0#So are you not aware of #p2111005#'s medicine, either?#l

#p2111005#'s medicine? Is #p2111005# ill?! Oh no... but she does cough quite often... If we're talking about #p2111005#'s medicine, then I do not know what it is... like I said, I do not have any memory of the past. If we are talking about a strange medicine, however, I do have one.
Have you not seen #p2111003# yet? Maybe he's not what you think you know of him as, but... never mind, I think it's better that you ask him yourself.
